file_content.text: I have no further need of you. For now.
You have your task. Do not waste time.
Good--you've arrived. Allow me to introduce you to Lord Aurren Panteer, nephew of the late Queen Silara Panteer, rightful queen of Alderaan.
Your lordship, these are the heroes I was speaking of--the ones responsible for crushing Ulgo's murderous plans against your noble house.
Your lordship, this is the hero I spoke to you about--the one who prevented Ulgo's barbarous attack against your noble house.
It is an honor to meet you--my family owes you a great debt. You will always be welcome in the home of Panteer.
It was my honor to crush your enemies, my lord.
Thank you.
I merely sowed a bit of destruction--my pleasure, really.
You're too kind.
Making problems go away is what I do best.
No problem.
I was merely doing my duty.
My pleasure.
Not much of a home these days, is it?
That's not saying much.
Treason and deceit have left us with no home but this. That is why we have summoned you here.
I didn't come here to trade friendly banter.
Get to the point.
True enough--it certainly isn't why we've asked you here.
The elimination of House Ulgo's strike teams has forced them to draw men from their castle guard. The heart of their house lies exposed.
Given your exemplary service in defense of House Panteer, Lord Aurren has deigned to grant you an opportunity to shape the future of Alderaan.
Bouris Ulgo, head of House Ulgo, has betrayed the noble laws of Alderaan and stolen the throne for himself. It will be your task to remove him from it.
Gladly.
Just as I told you, your lordship. The servants of House Thul and its allies are as fearless as they are loyal.
So I see, Lord Viktus. So I see.
I love a good battle.
This is one of the most heavily guarded men on all of Alderaan. You will find no shortage of foes.
You must think I'm a fool.
If the goal were simple, we would not need help performing it. Darth Viktus has assured me that you are capable.
Please do everything within your power to capture Bouris Ulgo alive. The people of Alderaan deserve to see that usurper face justice. They deserve--
Begging your pardon, my lord--an urgent matter requires your attention.
Very well, tell me what's happened....
Captured alive... you will do no such thing. Even in chains, Bouris Ulgo is a threat to House Thul's ascendance. He must be killed at all costs.
Bouris Ulgo has seen his last sunrise.
As you wish.
Excellent. Ah! Your lordship returns to us.
Isn't it our goal to make Panteer happy?
Lord Panteer disagrees.
We will be eliminating House Panteer's greatest enemy. That is their only true concern.
Why do we care about Bouris Ulgo? He's just one man.
Why does it matter?
Bouris Ulgo was a Republic war hero. He only claimed the throne in order to challenge House Thul and the Empire.
As long as Bouris Ulgo lives, he could influence people against our cause. Remember that.
My apologies. Now--you do understand the gravity of the task being given to you, don't you?
Bouris Ulgo is at the center of a castle stolen from our house, surrounded by an army of loyal troops. Until now, no one has dared challenge his position.
Castles and armies cannot stop me.
I fear nothing.
The look on his face when I blast him to his knees will be priceless.
Then I'll be the first.
I always get my target. Period.
Nothing can stop me.
No amount of security can prevent infiltration.
Everyone has a weakness.
We've waited so long... this will be a momentous day. I must make preparations.
I'll keep that in mind.
Just a massacre in the making.
Just be sure you show... discretion, where Bouris Ulgo himself is concerned.
I'll arrange for a special detachment of our elite Queensguard to move in behind you and collect the usurper once the job is done. Good luck.
Do not fail us.
You and I have nothing to discuss.
